name: SCNAnimatable
desc: The common interface for attaching animations to nodes, geometries, materials, and other SceneKit objects.

items.name: func addAnimation(SCNAnimationProtocol, forKey: String?)
items.desc: Adds an animation object for the specified key.

items.name: var animationKeys: [String]
items.desc: An array containing the keys of all animations currently attached to the object.

items.name: func removeAllAnimations()
items.desc: Removes all the animations currently attached to the object.

items.name: func removeAnimation(forKey: String)
items.desc: Removes the animation attached to the object with the specified key.
